awe6.core.InputJoypad

type
class
implements
awe6.interfaces.IInputJoypad
The InputJoypad class provides a minimalist implementation of the IInputJoypad interface.

For API documentation please review the corresponding Interfaces.

Constructor

new(p_kernel : awe6.interfaces.IKernel, p_up : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_right : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_down : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_left : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_primary : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_secondary : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_upAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_rightAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_downAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_leftAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_primaryAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, p_secondaryAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey)

Instance Methods

getButtonDownDuration( p_type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton, ?p_asTime : Bool, ?p_isPrevious : Bool ) : Float

getButtonUpDuration( p_type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton, ?p_asTime : Bool, ?p_isPrevious : Bool ) : Float

getIsButtonDown( p_type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton ) : Bool

getIsButtonPress( p_type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton ) : Bool

getIsButtonRelease( p_type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton ) : Bool
